script: Light travels faster than sound, which is the reason that some people appear bright before you hear them speak.
I went to buy some camo pants but couldn’t find any.
Two fish are in a tank. One says, ‘How do you drive this thing?’
My wife told me to stop impersonating a flamingo. I had to put my foot down.
expected_responses: Two fish are in a tank. One says, ‘How do you drive this thing?’
